channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Goldman strategist says he’ll turn ‘tactical bear’ after Valentine’s Day
Brazil and German markets bolted past Wall Street stocks in January
Chevron posts first refining loss in four years, hitting shares
FDA approves first new class of pain treatment in 20 years. Vertex shares soar.
Pennsylvania Gov. Shapiro announces plan to fast-track power plants and hydrogen projects amid energy crunch
item.description: Shapiro's plans elicited applause from renewable energy advocates, while business groups echoed Republican criticism, but said they were encouraged by...

item.title: Inside Errol Musk’s foray into the volatile world of memecoins
item.description: Why Elon Musk’s dad decided to endorse a cryptocurrency.

item.title: iPhone sales slump in China as Apple falters in key market
item.description: The company's overall sales in China declined 11.1% during the quarter to $18.51 billion.

item.title: Meta said it would fire staff who leaked company intel. Then that memo got leaked
item.description: Mark Zuckerberg bemoaned the fact his meetings and memos kept being leaked to the press, so Meta pledged to buckle down on staff.

item.title: Trump says Canada, Mexico tariffs coming Saturday. Stocks dived, then rallied.
Danish wind giant Orsted replaces its CEO with shares down 83% and Trump pressures looming
item.description: Orsted was in the fossil fuels business as "Danish Oil and Natural Gas" for much of its lifetime. It's renewable energy pivot is hurting in the U.S. n...
